LanguageData.Hopper.label: Hopper
LanguageData.Hopper.description: Holds resources for use by machines like nutrient paste dispensers.
LanguageData.TurretGun.label: Improvised turret
LanguageData.TurretGun.description: A weak improvised turret that automatically fires at nearby enemies. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.CommsConsole.label: Comms console
LanguageData.CommsConsole.description: Communicate with nearby ships here for negotiation and trade.
LanguageData.NutrientPasteDispenser.label: Nutrient paste dispenser
LanguageData.NutrientPasteDispenser.description: Synthesizes nutrient paste from organic feedstocks.
LanguageData.Grave.label: Grave
LanguageData.Grave.description: Place the dead in graves to give them a decent final resting place.
LanguageData.GibbetCage.label: Gibbet cage
LanguageData.GibbetCage.description: Place corpses in gibbet cages for display. These inspire disgust and fear.
LanguageData.SolarGenerator.label: Solar generator
LanguageData.SolarGenerator.description: Produces electricity from sunlight. Does not work in the dark.
LanguageData.GeothermalGenerator.label: Geothermal generator
LanguageData.GeothermalGenerator.description: Produces electricity from geothermal steam geysers. Must be placed on a geyser.
LanguageData.Battery.label: Battery
LanguageData.Battery.description: Stores electricity when there is excess power and yields it when there is not. Warning - charged batteries tend to explode when heated or wet.
